segments.pli: Atha kho bhagavā—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—jetavane antarahito devesu tāvatiṃsesu pāturahosi.
segments.en: Then the Buddha, as easily as a strong person would extend or contract their arm, vanished from Jeta’s Grove and reappeared among the gods of the Thirty-Three.

segments.pli: Atha kho sambahulā tāvatiṃsakāyikā devatāyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā devatāyo bhagavā etadavoca:
segments.en: Then several deities of the company of the Thirty-Three went up to the Buddha, bowed, and stood to one side. The Buddha said to them:

segments.pli: “Sādhu kho, āvuso, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṃ hoti—
segments.en: “Reverends, it’s good to have experiential confidence in the Buddha. …

segments.pli: itipi so bhagavā … pe … satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanahetu kho, āvuso, evam’idhekacce sattā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā.
segments.en: It’s the reason why some sentient beings are stream-enterers, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.
It’s good to have experiential confidence in the teaching. …

segments.pli: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe … samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
segments.en: and to have the ethical conduct that’s loved by the noble ones … leading to immersion.

segments.pli: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu kho, āvuso, evam’idhekacce sattā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā”ti.
segments.en: It’s the reason why some sentient beings are stream-enterers, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.”

segments.pli: “Sādhu kho, mārisa, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṃ hoti—
segments.en: “Good sir, it’s good to have experiential confidence in the Buddha …

segments.pli: itipi so bhagavā … pe … satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanahetu kho, mārisa, evamayaṃ pajā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā.
segments.en: It’s the reason why some sentient beings are stream-enterers, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.
It’s good to have experiential confidence in the teaching. …

segments.pli: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe … samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
segments.en: and to have the ethical conduct that’s loved by the noble ones … leading to immersion.

segments.pli: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu kho, mārisa, evamayaṃ pajā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā”ti.
segments.en: It’s the reason why some sentient beings are stream-enterers, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.”

sections.title: Then the Buddha, as easily as a strong person…

suttaplex.blurb: Moggallāna visits the gods of the Thirty-Three and encourages them in the four factors of stream-entry.
